'''Primo Grubb''' was one of the recipients of [[Bilbo]]'s gifts (a dinner-service) during his birthday party, in the drafts for ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.<ref>{{RS|2XIVN}}, Note 21, p. 247</ref> His name was changed from ''Inigo Grubb-Took'', and he was described as greedy and gluttonous.<ref>{{RS|1Ii}}, p. 15</ref>
